snippet: Iraqi soldiers described on Monday how Islamic State fighters inflicted heavy losses in a chaotic raid on a military base just an hour's drive from Baghdad, highlighting the jihadists' ability to attack high-profile targets despite U.S. air strike...

headline.print_headline: Iraqi Soldiers Describe Heavy Losses as Islamic State Overruns Camp
headline.main: Iraqi Soldiers Describe Heavy Losses as Islamic State Overruns Camp

lead_paragraph: Iraqi soldiers described on Monday how Islamic State fighters inflicted heavy losses in a chaotic raid on a military base just an hour's drive from Baghdad, highlighting the jihadists' ability to attack high-profile targets despite U.S. air strikes.
